name: Weak Knees Gochujang Sriracha Hot Sauce, Infused with Bold Korean Gochujang Paste & Classic Spicy Sriracha, Made in the USA, 10.5oz Squeeze Bottle
short_description: A TWIST ON A CLASSIC with our Korean Gochujang Sriracha: tangy sriracha with the deep, savory-sweet flavor of Korean gochujang chili paste. Made in the USA, vegan, gluten free, and paleo-friendly.

FLAVOR YOU'LL CRAVE from the rich umami of fermented Korean gochujang chili paste combined with bright vinegar, savory garlic, and just the right kick of heat. Sweet, complex, and extremely delicious.
JUST THE RIGHT HEAT wakes up your taste buds without overpowering, great for all palates. Perfect for ramen, wings, pizza, eggs, tacos, burgers, or even cocktails.
10.5OZ EAZY SQUEEZE BOTTLES make drizzling, dipping, and marinating a no-mess breeze. Don't stop here: try our curry sriracha and super spicy sriracha for the full flavor lineup.

REAL INGREDIENTS, REAL HEAT from chili peppers, garlic, vinegar, and spices; never artificial preservatives or fillers. Hot sauce gift sets make a great addition to a gift basket, food gifts or stocking stuffers.

short_description: Delicious as Always!- The basic ingredients of red chilies, garlic, and vinegar have not changed since the early days of the product. Today, the bottle lists the ingredients as chili, sugar, salt, garlic, distilled vinegar, potassium sorbate, sodium bisulfite, and xanthan gum.

The Original Huy Fong Sriracha Since 1980- Huy Fong Food’s Sriracha version is considered to be the Sriracha standard. For the huy fong chili sauces are made from fresh, red jalapeno chili peppers and contain no water or artificial colors.

Brings Top-shelf Flavor- Magical ingredients create flavors that will make your taste buds dance. Non-GMO, gluten-free. Enjoy it without an ounce of guilt. Low carb and vegan friendly. From families to restaurant chefs, Rooster Chili Sauce is used to create unique and delicious dishes.

Bite of Heat You're Looking- From scrambled eggs to tacos, This rooster sauce from Huy Fong Foods will add that bite of heat you're looking for. The Huy Fong Hot Chili Sriracha Sauce is the perfect hot chili sauce your party needs. Add just a dash of this hot pepper sauce for light heat or several for a real fiery kick.

Everyone loves Huy Fong Sriracha Sauce- Huy Fong sriracha sauce is on NASA's list of food supplies for space. With annual sales reaching 20 million bottles and occupying 10% of the US chili market, Huy Fong chili sauce has developed into one of the leaders in the chili market.

name: Huy Fong Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce, 17 oz Bottles, 2 pk
short_description: Huy-Fong Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce is created from freshly grown sun-ripened chilies
All of the sauces are made in California
Since the chilies are grown naturally, the spiciness of the product may vary.
The vinegar used in Huy-Fong Sriracha Hot Sauce is Gluten-Free
Certified Kosher by the Rabbinical Council of California
product_description: Huy-Fong Sriracha Hot Chili Sauce is created from freshly grown sun-ripened chilies. This full bodied sauce with the pure taste of chilies is ready to use in soups, sauces, pasta, pizza, hot dogs, hamburgers, chow-mein or anything to add extra flavor. Not only is it pleasantly spicy, it adds a depth of flavor that you've never experienced in any of your dishes. Hot sauce creator, David Tran, began his chili making mastery in 1975 in Vietnam. During his humble beginnings, the unsurpassable genius produced his first hot sauce called Pepper Sa-te. He filled his Sa-te sauce in recycled glass food jars that then was sold and delivered by family members via bicycle. In 1980, he started his chili legacy in a 5,000 sq. foot building nestled near Chinatown in Los Angeles.

name: Huy Fong Sriracha Chili Sauce, 482g Squeeze Bottle, Spicy Flavor Hot Sauce, Pack of 1+Char Siu Sauce 1pack
short_description: The Original Sriracha – Huy Fong Foods' version of Sriracha is considered a benchmark for chili sauces worldwide. Our hot sauce is made from fresh sun-ripened jalapeno chili peppers and contains no water or artificial colors.

Timeless, Unchanged Recipe – The essential blend of red chili, garlic, sugar, and vinegar has remained authentic since the product's inception, delivering the same beloved flavor that fans have enjoyed for decades.

Premium, Trusted Quality – Made with non-GMO ingredients and certified gluten-free. Enjoy its robust flavor with complete confidence. It's naturally vegan-friendly and fits a variety of dietary preferences.
A Globally Recognized Favorite – Listed on NASA's space food supply list, Huy Fong Sriracha Sauce has grown to become a popular choice in the hot sauce market.

Customize Your Perfect Heat Level – Add a few drops for a mild, flavorful warmth or be more generous for a noticeable, fiery kick. Huy Fong Sriracha is the perfect, versatile hot sauce for everyday meals, parties, and grilling.
product_description: Huy Fong Sriracha Chili Sauce has established itself as the original benchmark in the world of hot sauces, maintaining an unwavering commitment to quality and consistency. Since its creation, the recipe has remained authentically simple, blending fresh, sun-ripened jalapeno peppers with garlic, sugar, and vinegar to deliver the perfect balance of spicy, sweet, and tangy flavors. This iconic sauce contains no artificial colors or preservatives, staying true to its roots while meeting modern dietary preferences as a gluten-free, non-GMO, and vegan-friendly condiment. Recognized globally for its versatile heat and rich flavor, Huy Fong Sriracha has earned a place in countless kitchens and even aboard NASA's space missions. Its popularity stems from its ability to enhance any dish—whether stirred into soups, drizzled over eggs, used as a dipping sauce, or added to marinades. The sauce’s smooth, versatile consistency makes it easy to incorporate into a wide range of cuisines, from Asian-inspired dishes to American classics. Each 17 oz squeeze bottle offers convenience and control, allowing you to customize the spice level to your liking, whether you prefer a subtle warmth or a bold, fiery kick. As a household name and a pantry essential, Huy Fong Sriracha continues to be the go-to choice for heat seekers and flavor enthusiasts alike. Its timeless taste and reliable quality make it more than just a hot sauce—it’s a culinary staple trusted by home cooks and professional chefs around the world. Enjoy the authentic, robust flavor that has made this sauce a beloved favorite for decades.
